title: Somewhere Else
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2C4hxA9

by KaRaEa

After a night of sleep he only got through sheer grief and exhaustion, Steve wakes up…not where he went to sleep.
…
Steve turns over feeling warmer than he has since the ice. Something inside him has felt like it’s never thawed out, and usually when he wakes up it’s either in cold sweats or feeling like he used to in his old Brooklyn apartment in the middle of winter when the heating gave out. So the warmth is a novelty. 

It takes him several moments of slowly coming around in a cocoon of heat and comfort and what feels like it must have been actually decent sleep, before he realises the source of the warmth is lying next to him and not his own trapped body heat in the covers. His eyes flicker open, a confused frown already creasing his sleep lax face.

Brown tousled hair and the top of someone’s shoulder.

Steve sits up and leans over to see the person’s face, then promptly freezes.

It’s Tony.

Words: 19614, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Avengers Team (MCU), Guardians of the Galaxy Team
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Alternate Universe, FIx It, Author knows nothing about science or neurology beyond pop culture


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2C4hxA9

blog.name: auntmaylovebot
blog.title: man, shut the hell up
blog.description: nico. i'm a minor and a black female. (She/her) a marvel blog! not pro-tony stark.

summary: This isn’t a pro-tony stark blog!
title: This isn’t a pro-tony stark blog!
body:
When I watched the first avengers movie, I couldn’t articulate why I didn’t like Tony Stark when everyone else did. I thought, “maybe it’s because I’m watching this two years after everyone else”, but my feelings weren’t the same for the rest of the characters, only this one. Then I realized: “I just don’t like him”. Okay. That was fine. I don’t have to like him. 

BUT JESUS FUCKING CHRIST?? No one else in this fandom shuts the hell up about him! It’s like they forget that there are other damn characters in this bitch of a universe. He’s absolutely fucking annoying.

In the eyes of the people in the fandom, Tony Stark is a pure angel! He can do no wrong! No, of course he never manufactured weapons that killed people. No, of course he never blackmailed a teenager, of course he never got his “friends” thrown in prison, of course he never how could a pure baby angel do something as evil as that?

Well, he did. And he’s not a baby, he’s almost 50. He’s an adult male, with the ability to hold himself accountable, and yet, he doesn’t. In fact, he does the exact opposite and tries to hold everyone else accountable for something that he did (create Ultron), despite the warnings of another (Bruce).

And they rally around this character, endlessly. All of my streams are a constant flood of “Tony, this” and “Tony, that”. It’s telling of a very real problem that this fandom has with balancing a storyline between characters. I understand having a fave, but your fave is a piece of shit! It’s okay to have a favorite character that is also a piece of shit (look at loki lmao), but you can’t have a meltdown when people speak out against said piece of shit! You just can’t! Tony stark doesn’t run the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and he isn’t the most important character, and I need people to realize that I’m sick and fucking tired of it being the “Tony Stark Show” 24/7. I’ve lost my empathy for him, and I’ve lost my respect for him and the people who like him. I will definitely be posting more about this, because I need Tony stans to read a clear, concise argument instead of just plain discourse.

summary: I was wondering if you'd be willing to write some kind of Tony x Daughter reader? I was hoping you could write the scene in the...
question: I was wondering if you'd be willing to write some kind of Tony x Daughter reader? I was hoping you could write the scene in the Endgame trailer where tony is sending a message to pepper except he's making one for his daughter. (Or both. That works too lol) Whether or not the reader receives the messages or even survives the snap is totally up to you. Thank you 💚
answer:
@zelda-isgay @skymoonandstardust @anxieteandbiscuits @aw-hawkeye @avengersbarnes @emotionalsebastian @sad-af1121 @samtwilson

Warnings: angst. Pure motherfucking angst

Dying. That was how Tony felt like.

He hadn’t eaten in four days so he was hungry and any liquids that would keep him hydrated were almost gone too.

He knew he was not gonna survive this. He would never see Pepper again. Never hear her beautiful voice again when she called him out on something, never hear the laugh again of his beautiful daughter.

He was alone. He always had been.

No matter how close he seemed to be to his daughter, or how happy he was with Pepper. In the end, he would be alone.

And this was his end.

He coughed a few times, trying to get the suffocating feeling out of his chest, but he knew that the oxygen levels were too low for that.

But before he died, he wanted to do one last thing. For them. For them to know that he loved both with all of his heart.

“This thing on?” The eyes of the helmet flickered in the dark of the spaceship, almost blinding him for a second.

“Hey miss Potts, (Y/N), if one of you find this recording, don’t feel bad about this.”

He felt the natural panic of suffocating creeping up on him, but he suppressed it. He couldn’t use it, not now.

“Part of the journey is the end. Just here to be adrift in space, that’s mine.” Tears welled up in his eyes. he missed them so fucking much. He would give so much to see them again. but doing that… It would mean the end of the universe. And he would not let that happen.

“Food ran out four days ago. Oxygen will run out tomorrow.” Truth to be told, he knew damn well he couldn’t run out of oxygen and he knew (Y/N) knew that too, but he wanted to keep it simple.

“When I drift off I will dream about you two, it’s always you two.”

Little did he know…

That his message would never be found.

reblog.comment:
@zelda-isgay @skymoonandstardust @anxieteandbiscuits @aw-hawkeye @avengersbarnes @emotionalsebastian @sad-af1121 @samtwilson

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
the first chapter is up!!!

Title: Among The Stars He Lies

Summary: Doctor Strange came back to life from the ash to tell everyone that Tony Stark is not dead. He knows this, he saw it happen once from the 14,000,605 possible outcomes.

And from all of those 14,000,605 possible outcomes, he fell in love with him over and over again…Are they too late to save Tony Stark now?

summary: Peter: hey we’re supposed to dress as someone who inspires us for school on Friday. I wanted to go as you and was wandering if I...
body:
Peter: hey we’re supposed to dress as someone who inspires us for school on Friday. I wanted to go as you and was wandering if I could borrow-

Tony: you CANNOT wear an Ironman suit to school

Peter: actually I wanted to borrow your sunglasses and maybe a tie

Peter: Mr. Stark why are you crying, is something wrong?

blog.description: Writer - Gamer - Reader - Muslim - Dry humor - Hilarious gifs - We are Venom

summary:
Anyone remember that funny scene of Rhodey failing to use the ex wife in iron man 2? 

 Rhodey: get back.

 Tony: what are...
body:
Anyone remember that funny scene of Rhodey failing to use the ex wife in iron man 2?

Rhodey: get back.

Tony: what are you gonna do?

Rhodey: i’m gonna bust his bunker with the ex wife.

Tony: hammer tech?

Rhodey: -nods and then shoots the ex wife at Ivan. it bounces harmlessly off of Ivan’s suit and lands in a pool of water and gets fried-

Me: you know what, i am done.

-tosses popcorn to the side and walks out and slams the door-

Rhodey: get back.

Tony: what are you gonna do?

Rhodey: i’m gonna bust his bunker with the ex wife.

Tony: hammer tech?

Rhodey: -nods and then shoots the ex wife at Ivan. it bounces harmlessly off of Ivan’s suit and lands in a pool of water and gets fried-

Me: you know what, i am done.

-tosses popcorn to the side and walks out and slams the door-

trail.content_raw:
Anyone remember that funny scene of Rhodey failing to use the ex wife in iron man 2?

Rhodey: get back.

Tony: what are you gonna do?

Rhodey: i’m gonna bust his bunker with the ex wife.

Tony: hammer tech?

Rhodey: -nods and then shoots the ex wife at Ivan. it bounces harmlessly off of Ivan’s suit and lands in a pool of water and gets fried-

Me: you know what, i am done.

-tosses popcorn to the side and walks out and slams the door-

Anyone remember that funny scene of Rhodey failing to use the ex wife in iron man 2?

Rhodey: get back.

Tony: what are you gonna do?

Tony: hammer tech?

Rhodey: -nods and then shoots the ex wife at Ivan. it bounces harmlessly off of Ivan’s suit and lands in a pool of water and gets fried-

Me: you know what, i am done.

blog.description: Negan's Dr.Smarty-pants, I ship anything with Carl Grimes or Peter Parker in it. I do literate RPs. I love to talk so message/ask me anything. I'm not shy.

summary:
I am desperate!!!! Who wants to do anstarker rp! I’m up for pretty much anything!
Punk Tony x Flower Crown Peter
Alien Tony x...
body:
I am desperate!!!! Who wants to do anstarker rp! I’m up for pretty much anything!

Punk Tony x Flower Crown Peter

Alien Tony x Regular Peter

Rich Tony x Arm Candy Peter

Regular Tony x Human experiment Peter

Daddy/John Tony x Trafficked Peter

Savoir Tony x Hurt Peter

Time Traveler Tony x 1800s Peter

Scientist Tony x Deer Doe Peter

Explorior Tony x Mermaid Peter

Hero Tony x Newly Recurted Bad Guy Peter

If you are interested in any of these or none and just wanna discuss please pm me! I’m gonna die of bored!

blog.name: theavengersfanclub
blog.title: an ode to superheroes
blog.description: fanart, fanfiction and fan related things

summary: peter throughout the year: if only i could justify buying this Thing :/ maybe i'll ask Mr Stark for christmas or my birthday...
body:
peter throughout the year: if only i could justify buying this Thing :/ maybe i'll ask Mr Stark for christmas or my birthday

tony: give me a list of things you want for christmas/your birthday

peter: i have never wanted anything ever in my entire life

dialogue.name: p
dialogue.phrase:
peter throughout the year: if only i could justify buying this Thing :/ maybe i'll ask Mr Stark for christmas or my birthday

tony: give me a list of things you want for christmas/your birthday

peter: i have never wanted anything ever in my entire life

blog.name: theavengersfanclub
blog.title: an ode to superheroes
blog.description: fanart, fanfiction and fan related things

summary: tony stark before his birthday: birthdays aren't really a big deal for me. they don't matter at this point. i don't really need...
body:
tony stark before his birthday: birthdays aren't really a big deal for me. they don't matter at this point. i don't really need you guys to celebrate.

tony stark on his birthday: if i literally have to go one second without getting attention someone's getting murdered

dialogue.name: p
dialogue.phrase:
tony stark before his birthday: birthdays aren't really a big deal for me. they don't matter at this point. i don't really need you guys to celebrate.

tony stark on his birthday: if i literally have to go one second without getting attention someone's getting murdered
